title: From bike shop worker to Tour de France racer: the incredible journey of Elmar Reinders
content:
Inside the Jayco-AlUla rider's rapid rise and how the Dutch debutant will help Dylan Groenewegen in bunch sprints.

Read the full article at From bike shop worker to Tour de France racer: the incredible journey of Elmar Reinders on Velo.
author: Andy McGrath
